headline: Invesco Hires Crypto Product Leader from JPMorgan
summary: The firm, which offers six digital assets ETFs, announced a new global product leadership team earlier this year.

headline: Big Tech’s Furious Rally Forces Options Pros to Line Up Hedges
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Big Tech has led the furious rebound in US stocks from the tailspin that followed President Donald Trump’s sweeping April 2 tariff edict.
